name: Cynet Rebirth
text: If 2 or more "Code Talker" Link monsters are sent to your GY by an opponent's card: Special Summon those monsters but their effects are negated also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Cyberse monsters. If a Cyberse monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can banish this card and 1 Cyberse monster in your GY; return both battling monsters to the hand. You can only use 1 effect of "Cynet Rebirth" per turn and only once that turn
